spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall rectangular footprint roughly matches, and the broad zoning (kitchen left, dining/living right) is partially respected. However, multiple critical mismatches occur: the left-side stair zone from the plan is not correctly represented; the central bathroom block is reshaped and expanded into multiple partitions; the main entrance at the bottom center of the plan is not clearly present/placed correctly; exterior door locations on the top wall (single door near kitchen and double door at dining) do not match the 3D; window distribution and placement on right/bottom walls differs substantially. Room proportions also drift (central core too large; left-side service/stair area proportionally incorrect).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness and general wall geometry are reasonably consistent, but fidelity to the plan’s partitioning is weak. The plan shows a single compact bathroom centered; the 3D introduces extra internal rooms/corridor-like partitions around the core, changing adjacency relationships. The staircase element is effectively missing or not recognizable as the large left-side stair run shown. Several interior/exterior doors appear added or moved compared to the plan, indicating structural layout deviation and hallucinated openings.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen, dining, and living furniture are placed in broadly correct zones (kitchen fixtures left, dining table upper-middle/right, seating right). However, exact mapping to the 2D plan is not verifiable due to layout deviations (missing/altered stair zone and changed central core). Furniture scale appears generally consistent, though some pieces feel sparsely/loosely arranged relative to the plan’s implied room extents.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric presentation is clear with clean materials and readable space. Camera angle is acceptable and lighting is soft and consistent. Minor penalties: not truly orthographic (visible perspective), some geometry looks simplified/blocky (especially the central core), and openings/windows look inconsistently detailed relative to the plan.

detected_errors.description: Missing or non-represented staircase: the large left-side stair run shown in the 2D plan is not clearly present in the 3D layout.
Main entrance mismatch: the 2D plan entrance at the bottom center is not clearly located/represented in the 3D render.
Bathroom block misplaced/reshaped: the central bathroom in the 2D plan is expanded/altered in the 3D, changing its footprint and position relative to surrounding space.
Hallucinated internal partitions/rooms: the 3D central core contains extra small rooms/corridor-like divisions not shown in the 2D plan.
Exterior door placement mismatch: the top-wall doors (single near kitchen and double at dining in the plan) do not align with the 3D door locations.
Window placement mismatch: right and bottom wall window positions/counts differ from the 2D plan (notably the right-side window arrangement and bottom wall windows).
Proportion distortion: the left-side service/stair zone and the central core occupy incorrect relative area compared to the 2D plan, compressing/expanding adjacent open spaces.
